name: YOGS: Oncoming Game Surprises
description:
Art & Programming: Darzington + Zalinius
Music: Zalinius
Built with: libGDX

In case you really can't figure out a game, here are the instructions  (SPOILERS)

Moon Landing
Hold the space bar for at least half of the time

Poon
Press space to throw your poon, time it right to hit the sharky



Joust 
Use the left and right arrow keys to keep Toddy (right)
in the same jousting lane as Sir Prize (left)

Surprise Party
Press up or space to jump up ASAP after Simon arrives.
Don't jump up too early or too late, or you'll ruin the surprise!

Puzzle
Use the arrow keys to move the cursor, and space to grab the puzzle piece.
Drop it in the missing spot to reveal a surprised Yog!
